            Button.Dimensions(
                height = 56.0.dp,
                paddings = Button.Dimensions.PaddingValues(

                    end = 24.0.dp,
                ),
                minWidth = 98.0.dp,
                iconSize = 24.0.dp,
                spinnerSize = 22.0.dp,
                iconMargin = 8.0.dp,
            ),
        )
        .labelStyle(SddsServTheme.typography.bodyLBold)
